remarks:
Direct proof of ~ pwuninel avoiding functions and thus several ZF axioms. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.) 

---

 The power set of the union of a set does not belong to the set.  This theorem provides a way of constructing a new set that doesn't belong to a given set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
statement: pwuninel2 $p |- ( U. A e. V -> -. ~P U. A e. A ) $.
